Comment: Initiates a game that is more positional in nature.
I always played the Gruenfeld against d4 but because of recent setbacks on the opening I returned to the more classical approach d5.
Initiates the Queens Gambit, offering a non-center pawn for blacks center pawn.
Accepting the gambit offers lively game and requires more energetic play. I decline thinking of keeping my position close trying to understand what my opponent is planning.
